articles.description: Aston Villa reaction | Fans are pre-empting Grealish's depature as Manchester United watch on
articles.content:
Aston Villa aren't down and out yet, but a number of results today have got Villa fans preempting their club's biggest move of the summer.
 The future of Jack Grealish has caused much debate, and th… [+2630 chars]

articles.title: Lewis Hamilton and F1 stars face prison threat if they flout Hungary coronavirus rules - Mirror Online
articles.description: Lewis Hamilton and other British drivers Lando Norris and George Russell will only be allowed to leave their accommodation to travel to the track at next weekend's Hungarian Grand Prix
articles.content:
Lewis Hamilton could face prison time if he flouts strict coronavirus rules ahead of next weekend's Hungarian Grand Prix.

articles.author: Tara Fitzpatrick
articles.title: Celtic nine-in-a-row flag raised over Glasgow City Chambers in George Square - Daily Record
articles.description: The Hoops fan scaled the landmark building to switch the flags.
articles.content:
Glasgow City Council have launched a probe after a prankster raised a Celtic nine-in-a-row flag on over the city chambers.
